    Displays the options under the 'Order Manager' option, namely to create an order, cancel an order and clear table, add items to an order, remove items from an order, view an order, and print an invoice.

    Displays the options under the 'Report Manager' option, namely to generate a sale revenue report of a day, generate sale revenue report of a particular month, and print all invoices till date.
